title: Proficiency
content: Arcana, and can cast Protection from Evil and Good. One of the five Favored Enemy features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Mage Breaker Feature You have a history of battling spellcasters. Gain proficiency with Arcana and the True Strike cantrip., which gives you advantage on attack rolls against a creature. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell. One of the five Favored Enemy features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Knight Feature You have sworn to serve a crow
